title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Grow with us – Start your career at IU now!

Are you passionate about enhancing user experiences by leveraging conversational AI technology seamlessly on marketing websites? At IU International University, we are dedicated to making personalized education globally accessible with AI’s transformative power. We’re looking for a Full Stack Web Developer with a strong focus on User Experience (UX) to lead the development of intuitive and engaging interfaces powered by our custom Layer on top of ChatGPT for our multiple websites. Your role will be crucial in crafting personalized, engaging journeys on our website, helping potential students worldwide find their educational aspirations.

Seize this opportunity and support our team in Munich or at one of our other locations or remotely across Germany, starting immediately in fulltime as Full Stack Web Developer (m/f/d) UI/UX.

Our Stack

    Technologies: VueJS 3 and Nuxt 3 with TypeScript; StoryBlok CMS via RestAPI; NodeJS; Vite; TailwindCSS; ChatGPT Integrations; Microservices with PHP 8.3 and Laravel
    Optional Knowledge: Kafka, AWS Kubernetes, AWS Cloudfront, AWS Serverless Aurora, GitLab Pipelines, Cloudinary

Your tasks

    As a pivotal member of our agile team, you will be crucial in bridging the gap between Designers and Engineers. You will focus on enhancing UX/UI through AI-powered features and services to attract new customers to our websites and continue to improve our conversion rate.

    Your primary responsibility will be to bring a design sensibility to development, ensure seamless collaboration with designers, and translate design concepts into beautiful, functional interfaces that dynamically integrate continuous data streams and adapt smoothly to changes after the page load.

    Utilize your vast knowledge of UX and experience with design systems to improve the user experience across our marketing website platform proactively.

    Stay at the forefront of industry trends, particularly AI, and continuously explore new tools and features, next to leveraging established tools like GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT to innovate and improve our development process.

    Share your knowledge with the team, mentor junior colleagues, and foster an environment of continuous professional growth.

Your Profile

    You should have a deep understanding of web technologies, a keen eye for design, and a proven track record of improving UX/UI.
    You have solid experience with TypeScript and frameworks like VueJS and proficiency in object-oriented PHP, SQL, and Laravel.
    You have an extensive background in design systems, dynamic data integration, and automation to create user-centric, visually appealing solutions.
    You are a proactive communicator and collaborative team member who actively engages with engineers, designers, and key stakeholders by sharing knowledge and confidently voicing ideas in guild and community meetings and companywide conferences to deliver outstanding products.
    You are an enthusiastic learner who constantly explores new technologies and techniques to drive innovation.

We offer

    Shape your career: Rapid growth opens up many new opportunities for you. Tell us about your dream career, and we’ll help you make it happen.
    Work from wherever you want …: Modern tools and video meetings make it possible: with IU, the boundaries between here and there blur. You want to work from abroad for a while? No problem thanks to our WorkFlex benefits – up to six months a year, anywhere in the EU and beyond.
    … and flexible time: It’s your job: We trust you and give you the greatest possible freedom to organize yourself.
    Take your knowledge to a new level: Benefit from a 100% discount on tuition fees for an IU combined degree in the tech sector and many other free training courses. There is always something new to learn.
    Get a good rest: we push ourselves every day to go above and beyond. But we also take the time to recharge our batteries: with 30 days of annual vacation for all employees and an additional day off on your birthday! Need some time off? How about a sabbatical?
    Reach your destination sustainably: Germanys 9 euro ticket is history, we got the DeutschlandTicket for 7 €. You prefer to travel by bike? Then a Jobrad (bike leasing) might be the right choice. We offer many environmentally conscious options to be mobile both professionally and privately.

Join our MarTech Team at Germany’s largest university with over 100,000 students! We are passionate, competitive, open to anything new – and we live to develop anything that makes our students’ digital education experience and our IU services better to achieve our vision “Everybody can access education to grow”.

Sounds like the perfect job for you? Then apply now! If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact Ronja at ronja.kaiser@iu.org.

Words are followed by actions: We take our “Culture Of Everyone” very seriously and would like to take this opportunity to expressly point out that you are welcome to join us, regardless of your origin, religion, gender, age or sexual orientation. Even if you have a disability, our doors are wide open to you. We look forward to a diverse community here at IU!
skillList: vue, nuxt, typescript, node, sql, php, laravel, oop, rest, storyblok, vite, microservices, kafka, gitlab, aws, awsaurora, cloudfront, kubernetes, ai, ux

title: Frontend Engineer React/TypeScript
description:
Einleitung

At voize we develop an app that allows professionals like healthcare workers and inspection engineers to fill out forms via domain-specific speech recognition. Healthcare workers speak freely and our AI automatically generates the correct structured forms.

We are YC-funded and grow quickly. Our customers like Caritas, Contilia, and TÜV NORD create thousands of documentation records every single day.

Today speech recognition is primarily used as a “fun” gimmick for consumers, who set kitchen timers with their Alexa speaker. We build a completely new class of speech-powered applications, to supercharge the professional workforce. By focusing on individual workflows like healthcare or vehicle inspections, we create truly magical user experiences and save each user 30 minutes per day in administrative work. Don’t believe it? See for yourself in our 3-minute product demo (https://youtu.be/AlkVD4OwCQk).

The entire system is built in-house, giving us full control over the user experience, product design, NLP models, and speech recognition. Our custom speech recognition models already outperform Google with 10x lower error rates and we are just getting started!

If you ever wanted to work at the bleeding edge of product design, applied machine learning research, and MLOps, you should apply. You get to build products with daily user feedback, train AI models on real-world data, and ship to production on a daily basis.

At voize new software is deployed to production every 5h on average! We deploy new AI models every 24h and have one of the largest speech data sets for medical documentation.
Aufgaben

We’re looking for team members who work on the platform that supercharges our teams to iterate & ship quickly

As a Frontend Engineer at voize, you will take core responsibility for our in-house machine learning platform and our internal data labeling application. You will work closely with the founders, the data labeling team and the ML team. You get to take ownership over the whole development cycle, from feature ideation to technical execution, to analytics review and hearing user feedback.
Qualifikation

You should be comfortable with the following tech stack and skills

    ReactJS & TypeScript
    Modern ReactJS coding with hooks and functional components
    Typical Software Engineering skills like Git, CI/DC, Docker, etc.
    An eye for good product design

Bonus Skills are

    Kotlin
    Machine Learning
    Backend Engineering

Team Work & Personal Skills:

    You have to be able to work in a team, communicate clearly, take ownership over your work and share feedback with your teammates.
    You need to feel empathy for the user and have a deep passion for great product experiences. You will talk to users, listen to their feedback, understand their daily challenges, and translate those insights into product decisions.
    You need great time management skills and be self-sufficient. Your colleges have to be able to rely on you.

Language & Region

    You need to be able to speak German fluently. (especially to talk to customers)
    You need to live in Germany and be legally allowed to work in ;Germany.,

Benefits

    voize is based in Berlin and has a remote-friendly workplace.
    We offer flexible work hours and believe that you know best when you want to work
    We have an open culture and regular team events
    As a fast-growing startup, there are new challenges daily and plenty of learning opportunities for your personal development
    Own part of the company through stock option packages

Noch ein paar Worte zum Schluss

Interview Process

To help us determine that we are both a great fit for each other and are happy to change the world together for years to come, we run a 4 stage interview process. This process is usually completed in 2-3 weeks.

1. First Call with the founder (Remote):

This is a more informal video call with you and one of our founders, to get to know you, and share more details on the role. Together we want to determine if this role is a great fit for you and get a basic understanding of your personal interests and technical & soft skills.

2. Technical Interview with CTO (Remote):

In this video call, we want to learn more about your technical skills and past projects you have worked on.

The best way to impress us is by showing us a project you’ve built and walking us through the 2 hardest technical/design decisions you had to make.

Mostly, we want to know that you can code and ship fairly involved systems, and speak to them with clarity on the details. This tends to be a good indication that an engineer had strong ownership and showed autonomy in making a product or technical decisions.

3. Pair Programming Challenge (On site):

At this stage, we want to show you the kind of challenges we are facing on a daily basis. In a pair programming setting, you will get access to a portion of our system and will debug an Error we’ve introduced or build a prototype of a new feature.

4. Onboarding

If you and our team both see a great culture and technical fit, we will send you a job offer and walk you through our onboarding process.

In your first week, you will ship your very own first feature to production! We will prepare a great first task, help you along the way and celebrate the release and direct user feedback.
skillList: react, typescript, git, cicd, docker, kotlin, machinelearning, mlops

title: Frontend Developer
description:
We make over 9 million customers happy every day. No matter whether laws change, technologies continue to develop or customers express new wishes - we remain a reliable constant for our customers. So too for our employees: No matter what surprises life has in store, we are there for them – with the allowances, benefits and development opportunities they need. Does that sound good? Then enrich our IT team „Business Banking“, our developer community is looking forward to working with you!

Collaborating closely with product owners, designers, and customer journey experts, you conceptualize and implement innovative solutions while enhancing existing banking functionalities.     Solution-oriented, structured and enjoy working in a team.
    A strong passion for learning new things.

description:

    TEAM UND FIRMENEVENTS

Qualifikationen

Über Riverland Reply

Riverland Reply ist auf die Beratung von kundenorientierten End-to-End-Lösungen und Strategien spezialisiert und unterstützt seine Kunden bei strategischen IT-Entscheidungen, der Implementierung von definierten Lösungen und der Produktionsausführung. Das Unternehmen kombiniert fundierte Kenntnisse der digitalen Customer Experience mit dem gesamten Potenzial der nativen Cloud-Technologien. Diese Expertise ermöglicht es Riverland Reply, die Barrieren zwischen einer produktbasierten Technologie und einer komplett kundenspezifischen Implementierung zu beseitigen. Ausgehend davon, dass die Customer Experience im digitalen Zeitalter sehr flexibel sein muss, um an verschiedene Branchen angepasst werden zu können, berät das Unternehmen insbesondere Kunden aus der Automobil-, Transport-, Logistik- und Finanzbranche.

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
About us
METYCLE - where innovation meets sustainability. 

We are building the B2B online platform to accelerate the global circular flow of secondary metals. By connecting buyers and sellers of scrap metal globally, we are enabling efficient trade of secondary metals and are driving the seamless flow of recycling material, essential for reducing CO2 emissions by up to 95% compared to primary metal production.
 
Join us at the early stage in bringing the $610 billion scrap metal trading industry into the 21st century and in shaping the future of metal recycling and green energy solutions.
Who are we looking for?
We are seeking a talented and experienced Fullstack Engineer with a wide technical view to join our team and help us build innovative solutions for the scrap metal trading business.

The role is remote and candidates should have permission to reside and work in the European Union - no visa sponsorship is available.

We welcome applications from all interested candidates - unsolicited recruiter contacts will not be responded.
Your mission

    Design, develop, and maintain high-quality web applications using modern technologies and best practices.
    Collaborate with product, design and business stakeholders to define, design, and implement new features and enhancements.
    Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code, ensuring optimal performance and scalability.
    Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, providing timely and effective solutions.
    Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to peers.
    Foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
    Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, incorporating them into projects when appropriate.

Your profile

    Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
    Proficiency in frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.
    Strong backend development skills using languages like Node.js, Python, Ruby, or Java, and experience with frameworks like Express, Django, or Rails.
    Familiarity with database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
    Experience with version control systems like Git.
    Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.
    Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
    Strong communication and collaboration skills.
    Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud (huge plus!).
    Familiarity with containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes (huge plus!).

Why join us?

    You will be part of a supportive and collaborative work environment.
    You will be able to take ownership and grow within an early-stage dynamic team.
    You will be given the opportunity to challenge the status quo and work on a new venture with a great impact on the industry.
    You will join an environment with flat hierarchies and a steep learning curve with exciting growth opportunities.

Contact
Discover more about METYCLE:
About us | LinkedIn 

We look forward to receiving your application. Irene Prinz is happy to answer any questions you may have: +49 152 34 62 72 85.
skillList: react, angular, vue, node, python, ruby, java, express, django, rubyonrails, mysql, postgres, mongodb, git, rest, aws, azure, googlecloud, docker, kubernetes

title: Frontend Developer
description:
GameDuell is a high traffic platform with more than 500 million page views a month. Therefore, we are looking for a HTML5 / Frontend Developer* who is capable of performance-oriented and well-structured programming. You will work as part of an international team on the development of responsive websites for mobile devices and desktop browsers.Your tasks

    Use HTML5 to develop responsive websites for games
    Create prototyping concepts and apply graphic visions to websites
    Build new features for the GameDuell platform
    Responsibility for performance issues and the technical design of the mobile website
    Review code and evaluate team members results

What we expect

    A minimum of 3 years’ experience as a Frontend Developer*
    A completed university degree in computer engineering, computer science or similar
    Several years of experience particularly in JavaScript (incl. FP & OOP), in HTML, and CSS3
    Very good knowledge of TypeScript
    Profound experience with JavaScript frameworks preferably Vue.js, or Angular, React, etc.
    A high proficiency level in building, understanding, and maintaining of complex web applications
    Understanding of RESTful backend interfaces (e.g., with Swagger)
    Experience with JavaScript Testing (Unit Tests with Jest)
    Fluent English is mandatory

Nice to have

    Knowledge of CSS preprocessors like Less CSS or Sass/SCSS
    A good eye for design and a working understanding of high usability
    Good understanding of responsive web design
    Experience in development with JSF/Jakarta Faces is a plus
    Knowledge of German is very welcome
    Experience with agile software development, ideally with Scrum
     

What we offer

    Look forward to one of the best working environments in Berlin: our well-situated office in Mitte (includes free soft drinks, fruit, pool table, table tennis, a sunny rooftop terrace, and much more)
    Developing the best products and inspiring our customers by providing an extraordinary game experience
    Challenging tasks and interesting opportunities for your professional as well as personal development
    Meet-ups, tech talks, networking events, BBQs, newbie dinner, summer party, Halloween party, family-and-friends party, gaming sessions, sports activities, etc. just to name a few – we are hosting all of them with our own event team
    Yoga and back training classes
    A versatile, friendly, and international team that guarantees fun on the job
    Visa & relocation support
    Flexible working hours, hybrid work model possible
    32 work hours at four days/week, ideally starting in September/October 2024
     

We are an ecological and socially sustainable company and have our very own “Green Team” where you can make an impact and actively implement ideas and initiatives to help protect our environment and for charity. As a games community, we take our social responsibility seriously. We are co-founders of the “Leaders for Climate Action” and have committed ourselves to becoming carbon neutral.

    We pay attention to environmental friendly and resource-efficient standards when purchasing our office and food supplies
    We match your charity donations
    Social responsibility begins with each of us. Our corporate culture is characterized by mutual trust and respect. Our open and international team welcomes and respects diversity

Contact us

Contact us

If you are up for the challenge, then say "hello" to our recruiter Stefan!

(jobs@gameduell.de)

We look forward to receiving your application. Please send your complete and detailed application including salary expectations and earliest possible start date as PDF with the subject ‘HTML5 / Frontend Developer *’.

* GameDuell is proud to be an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate in its hiring practices. Any terms referring to people are valid for all genders whether male, female, or diverse.
skillList: vue, react, angular, jakartafaces, sass, rest, oop, functionalprogramming, testing

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung
Around the Globe!

Under this motto, our partner company, a Start-up based in Berlin and London, is developing an innovative Fintech SaaS solution for Agrifood Exporters from the USA, South America and Africa. As part of the development team in Berlin, you will take the software to the next level and support the realignment of the tech stack.

Tasks

    Green Field Development of a brand new SaaS solution - based on JavaScript / Typescript / Node.js / Svelte
    Development of a complex SaaS solution in the field of financing for agrifood buyers and sellers worldwide
    Agile pair programming within the Berlin development team
    Advancement of the cloud-based real-time platform to make global agrifood supply chains more efficient
    Identification of new technical solutions for an even more performant SaaS platform

Requirements

    Completed IT studies and a minimum of 5 years of professional experience
    Deep knowledge of JavaScript, Typescript, Node.js
    Experience in full-stack development with Svelte, HTML, CSS, Docker
    Focus on functional development
    Enthusiasm for an agile startup flair
    Fluent in English

Benefits

    Startup in the heart of Berlin
    Dynamic team and direct collaboration with the CTO
    Development of a complex SaaS platform
    Pair programming in the agile tech team
    Multinational environment
    Salary range 80k - 110k (depending on experience level)
skillList: svelte, node, typescript, saas, cloud, docker

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
Staff Fullstack Engineer
Permanent employee, Full-time · Berlin
THE IMPACT YOU WILL MAKE

From socks, and petfood, to cosmetics, charles is helping countless brands reach their loyal customers every day, one conversation at a time. Being a staff fullstack engineer at charles means leading talented engineers and exciting projects, to push the frontier of what conversational commerce can become. You will set the bar on how end-to-end product development looks like, from conceptualization to post-launch. Join us to build strong brands and retain happy customers together.
THIS IS WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING

    Set the bar at charles on our tech stack: Vue, Typescript and Node.js, to build scalable and maintainable codebases.
    Lead architectural design and development on charles’ conversational commerce platform.
    Lead the testing strategy to uphold the reliability and functionality of the application.
    Make hard engineering and strategy tradeoffs in service of our product vision
    Optimize application and database performance to ensure a smooth and efficient user experience.
    Orchestrate the decision-making process regarding the selection of frontend technologies and tools.
    Be the liaison between designers, product managers and engineers to bring our product vision into reality.

YOU'LL FIT GREAT WITH THESE SKILLS AND VALUES

    Have 5+ years of experience building large-scale complex systems. Having both scale-up and start-up experiences is a big plus.
    Proficiency in Typescript and Node.js and at least one modern frontend framework (Vue, React, Angular, Svelte)
    Proficiency in event-driven architecture
    Strong command in relational databases like Postgres
    Extensive mentorship experience. Strong communication and leadership skills
    You use code review as a tool to mentor and uphold the standard of the systems you own
    A bachelor's or master's degree in computer science or another relevant technical field—or equivalent experience

THINGS WE OFFER

    Working on challenging and impactful projects at the forefront of one of the most innovative industries in Europe
    Collaborating with some of the leading experts in Conversational Commerce and disrupting a fast-growing industry
    Joining forces with a unique community of Tech, Product, Sales, Success, and Marketing experts committed to building the best product in Conversational Commerce
    Having high visibility and impact across the business with the option to own and drive new initiatives
    Celebrating our major and micro-wins as well as getting to know each other better at regular team-building events
    Sharing ESOP (virtual stock options) in the ownership and success of charles
    Working in a brand new office in the heart of Berlin overlooking the Wall memorial
    Earning a competitive compensation package

What else we offer?

    Urban Sports Club membership
    A weekly personal trainer
    Meditation session on Tuesdays
    Free company lunch on Thursdays
    A friendly, open, multicultural work environment
    Dog-friendly office
    Discounts on BVG tickets

About us

It’s better to have a conversation

charles is a SaaS startup that enables brands to use the full potential of WhatsApp Business. With our platform, businesses can chat with customers, send marketing campaigns, sell products, analyze results and automate processes. And we go beyond the tech to offer ongoing consultancy for future success. Our vision is to become the global backbone of conversational commerce (cCom): a world in which all consumers can enjoy personal, rewarding, heartfelt conversations with the brands they love.

Founded by Kapten & Son co-founder, Artjem Weissbeck, and ex-McKinsey e-commerce lead, Andreas Tussing, charles is backed by Salesforce Ventures, Accel, and HV Capital. We received €30 million in total funding and are now pushing for the next big stage of our growth. This makes now a good time for you to join us on this journey!

charles and diversity: be yourself and no-one else

Different perspectives bring innovation and richer work environments. We’re committed to building an inclusive company where you always feel like you belong, whatever your age, gender identity, ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, disability, status or neurodiversity. These values sit at the heart of our hiring process, so we can create a welcoming workplace where everyone feels valued and heard.
skillList: vue, react, angular, svelte, node, typescript, postgres

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Über &effect
&effect unterstützt Organisation im sozialen und öffentlichen Sektor ihre Daten für einen positiven Impact einsetzen zu können. Dabei setzen wir auf datengesteuerte Prozesse und evidenzbasierte Entscheidungen.

Als interdisziplinäres Team wollen wir unsere Fähigkeiten nutzen, um etwas zu verändern! Wir entwickeln Daten- und Softwareprodukte, um Datensilos aufzubrechen, unstrukturierte Daten nutzbar zu machen und die Datenkommunikation einfach, wirkungsvoll und schön zu gestalten. Wir lieben es im Team zusammenzuarbeiten, Erfahrungen auszutauschen und freuen uns darauf, Organisationen bei dem Aufbau nachhaltiger und wirkungsvoller Datenkompetenzen zu unterstützen.
Deine Möglichkeiten

    Du fängst bei uns als Full Stack Entwickler:in an.
    Du entwickelst Webanwendung. Du schreibst sowohl Backend- als auch Frontend-Code. 
    Du unterstützt die Weiterentwicklung unseres Tech Stacks und unserer Infrastruktur.
    Du arbeitest eng mit anderen Teammitgliedern und unseren Kund:innen zusammen, um individuelle Lösungen gemeinsam zu entwickeln. 
    Wir legen Wert auf eine integrierte Sichtweise von Data Science und Software-Entwicklung, so dass du auch die Möglichkeit hast, andere Bereiche wie Data Science zu erkunden und zu bearbeiten.

Du würdest gut zu uns passen, wenn

    es ist dir wichtig ist, dass Daten und Technologien auf sozial verantwortliche Weise genutzt werden.
    du ein Studium in einem relevanten Bereich abgeschlossen hast, z. B. Data Science, Informatik, Sozialwissenschaften, Mathematik oder eine ähnliche Disziplin.
    du bereits Arbeitserfahrung gesammelt hast.
    du Deutsch auf Niveau C2 beherrschst und Englisch fließend sprichst und schreibst.
    du über sehr gute Python-Kenntnisse verfügst und Erfahrung in der Entwicklung von Webanwendungen hast. 
    du hast praktische Erfahrungen mit der Entwicklung von Webanwendungen mit FastAPI, Flask, Django oder einem anderem Python Framework. Du bist vertraut mit der Entwicklung von REST APIs.
    du hast praktische Erfahrungen mit dem Entwickeln von Single Page Anwendungen mit Vue.js, React, Angular oder einem anderem JavaScript Framework. Du bist vertraut mit TypeScript.
    du mit dem Schreiben von komplexen SQL-Queries vertraut bist.
    du hast Erfahrung mit Docker, Terraform, Ansible und Cloud Services. Du bist mit dem grundsätzlichen Umgang von Unix Systemen betraut.
    du arbeitest selbstständig und bis in der Lage komplexe Projekte eigenständig zu managen. Du kannst Projekte strukturieren und kommunizierst effektiv mit Auftraggebenden und Teammitgliedern.
    du motiviert bist,  Kund:innen zu beraten und individuelle Lösungen zu entwickeln.
    du hast Spaß daran dein Wissen mit dem Team zu teilen und unterstützt andere Teammitglieder.

Auch wenn deine Erfahrungen nicht perfekt mit den oben genannten Punkten übereinstimmen, ermutigen wir dich, dich zu bewerben! Solltest du Fragen oder Unsicherheiten bezüglich der Stelle haben, kontaktiere uns gerne - wir sind für dich da.
Wir bieten

    Du kannst, wie einige von uns, überall/irgendwo in Deutschland leben. Gelegentlich treffen wir uns persönlich zu unseren Team Events in unserem schönen Ladenbüro in Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg.
    Ein MacBook und zusätzliche Ausrüstung je nach Bedarf.
    Ein Deutschland-Ticket.
    Ein Fortbildungsbudget.
    Eine Urban-Sport-Mitgliedschaft zum Ausgleich.
    Eine Vergütung die sich nach einem transparenten Gehaltsmodell richtet und deine persönliche Weiterentwicklung und Verantwortung berücksichtigt. (Gehaltsspanne: 63.000 - 68.000 €)
    Einen Bonus der sich an dem Unternehmensgewinn orientiert.

Der &effect Tech Stack

    Unsere Backends entwickeln wir mit Python. Für die REST-APIs verwenden wir FastAPI und für unsere Datenpipelines verwenden wir Tools wie Airflow und Celery.
    Die Datenbank unserer Wahl ist PostgreSQL.
    Unsere Frontends bauen wir mit Vue.js und Nuxt.js. Alles wird in TypeScript geschrieben. Unsere UI Components bauen auf Vuetify auf.
    Für unsere Datenanalysen verwenden wir hauptsächlich Python, jedoch greifen wir gelegentlich auch auf R zurück.
    Wir nutzen State-of-the-art Libraries (z.B. transformers, spacy) und Tools (z.B. hugging-face, modal) für die Entwicklung von Modellen.

Wie wir arbeiten

    Impact-orientiert: Wir streben danach, unseren Partner:innen wirkungsvolle Datenprodukte zu liefern. Wir entwickeln nachhaltige Lösungen, die in den spezifischen Kontext des sozialen und öffentlichen Sektors passen.
    Gemeinsam wachsen: Wir organisieren regelmäßig Teamtage und Team Events, um als Team gemeinsam zu wachsen (Reisekosten werden für Remote-Mitarbeitende übernommen). Ein jährlicher Höhepunkt ist unser gemeinsamer Besuch der PyCon-Konferenz.
    Zusammen lernen: Wir haben keine Angst vor Fehlern; wir lernen aus ihnen und konzentrieren uns auf kontinuierliches Lernen. Wir sind immer bereit unsere Zusammenarbeit neu zu gestalten.
    Respekt- und verantwortungsvoller Umgang: Wir behandeln alle Menschen mit Respekt, unabhängig von ihrer Herkunft, ihrem Geschlecht, ihrer sexuellen Identität, ihrer Bildung, ihrer Religion, ihren Überzeugungen oder ihren körperlichen Fähigkeiten. Wir sind uns bewusst, dass Menschen unterschiedliche Erfahrungen gemacht haben, schätzen und fördern Vielfalt und arbeiten ständig daran, ein integratives Arbeitsumfeld für alle zu schaffen.
    Offene und faire Kommunikation: Wir kommunizieren respektvoll miteinander. Wir schätzen und respektieren die Zeit und die Mühe, die wir uns im Team füreinander nehmen.

Dein erster Monat

    Du lebst dich bei uns ein und lernst das Team und deinen Manager Jan kennen.
    Du durchläufst das Onboarding und wirst in unsere Entwicklungs-Prozesse eingeführt.
    Du entwickelst dein erstes internes Projekt mit unserem Stack.

In den ersten 3 Monaten

    Du übernimmst Aufgaben in unseren Projekten. Auf unserer Website findest du einige der Lösungen, die wir entwickeln.
    Du kennst dich gut mit unserem Tech Stack aus.
    Du bist mit unserer Infrastruktur vertraut.

In den ersten 6 Monate

    Du übernimmst die Verantwortung für ein erstes Projekt oder Produkt.
    Du übernimmst die Kommunikation und berätst Auftraggebende.
    Du entwickelst unseren Tech Stack und unsere Infrastruktur aktiv im Team weiter.

Unser Einstellungsprozess
Unser Einstellungsprozess ist vollständig digital und wir kommunizieren mit dir per E-Mail und Videochat. Wir haben ein dreistufiges Verfahren.

    Zwei unserer Entwickler:innen führen ein Screening-Gespräch mit dir.
    Du bekommst eine Aufgabe die du innerhalb von einer Woche bearbeiten musst.
    In einem zweiten Gespräch werden wir die Aufgabe besprechen und du lernst ein weiteres Teammitglied kennen.

Wir freuen uns über alle Bewerbungen unabhängig des Hintergrunds und legen Wert auf Chancengleichheit im Verfahren und auch im Arbeitsumfeld.
Nachdem du dich bei uns beworben hast, wirst du von uns hören. Während des gesamten Prozesses bemühen wir uns, dich innerhalb von sieben Tag über den Stand deiner Bewerbung zu informieren. Wir wissen, dass manchmal Fehler passieren. Wenn du also Fragen zum Stand der Dinge oder zum Verfahren hast, frage einfach bei Jan Kamb nach.
skillList: python, fastapi, flask, rest, vue, nuxt, react, angular, typescript, postgres, docker, terraform, ansible, cloud, airflow, celery, r

title: Webentwickler

    30 Tage Urlaub

    flexible Arbeitszeiten

    Lern- und Feedbackkultur in einem agilen Umfeld

Wir haben bundesweit viele interessante Optionen im Bereich Software-Entwicklung, Web-Entwicklung, KI/AI und Big Data sowie Führungsaufgaben in der Tech-Branche.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
Your mission

    Consume, analyze, and implement designs into performant, responsive, and interactive Web Application screens, components and flows
    Build reliable, performant, and scalable APIs & services/functions
    Meeting with the software engineering team to define the scope and scale of software projects/tasks
    Advocate and demonstrate new product features and capabilities
    Troubleshooting, bug fixing, and writing technical documents
    Identifying bottlenecks and improving software efficiency

Your profile

    Previous experience as a full stack engineer, especially with Javascript, React, HTML, Typescript, AWS Lambda, AWS DynamoDB, etc.
    Experience in building and consuming REST or GraphQL APIs
    Ability to learn and adapt to working with multiple programming languages and produce high-quality, & clean code
    You're comfortable working in serverless-based, cloud-native architectures
    Knowledge of database systems, including NOSQL (e.g. DynamoDB), SQL (e.g. PostgreSQL), caching (Redis)
    Passion for simplicity and great Developer Experience
    Comfortable working in a remote and hybrid work environment
    Located in either Berlin, or elsewhere in Germany with willingness to commute to Berlin on a monthly basis

Why us?
Our values are rounded off by yours

    Humanity - We value ourselves and each other
    Openness - We’re keeping our doors and minds open
    Positivity - We trust evervone's positive intent
    Entrepreneurship - We're driven to create impact
    Respect - We appreciate diversity & communicate respectfully
    Authenticity - We're genuine and value our strengths


Benefits @ Eterno 

    Be part of the craziest story in German healthcare
    Modern and centrally located offices in Berlin, Hamburg and Frankfurt + Remote work for full flexibility
    Highest level of autonomy and  entrepreneurship
    Company pension scheme, access to our Eterno Spaces for quick doctor visits & health check-ups
    Corporate benefits, JobRad, language courses, Refer-A-Friend bonus and a monthly budget for Probonio, Mobility or Urban Sports Club
    Regular team events & Offsites


Disclaimer
We deliberately refrain from explicitly mentioning (m/f/d) in our job titles in order to ensure an open and non-discriminatory approach. We are referring to all persons. Eterno is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on the basis of ethnicity, genetic information, color, physical or mental disability, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, medical condition, pregnancy, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or other personal characteristics. 
Auf diese Stelle bewerben
About us
Eterno
Eterno provides solutions for modern primary care revolutionizing the way doctors and their patients interact digitally and in person. Our offering includes Spaces, Software and Services (“3S”). We’re building fully digitized primary care centers in Germany and offer doctors and therapists a risk-free form of self-employment - a kind of co-working space for primary care practitioners. We utilize state-of-the-art technologies, automation, and proprietary software to redesign processes and handle administrative tasks. This allows doctors to focus on treating their patients, while we take care of the rest (e.g. frontdesk staff, callcenter, operations, quality management, IT, billing). Meanwhile, patients access digital, interdisciplinary, and modern healthcare through our spaces. Including healing architecture concepts, yoga, gym and our own barista. Modern healthcare for all.

title: Backend-Entwickler
description:
Wir suchen einen leidenschaftlichen Backend-Entwickler mit Mittelstufen-Erfahrung und Kenntnissen in Typescript und Express.js, um unserem Technik-Team beizutreten. Diese Rolle ist entscheidend für das Entwerfen, Entwickeln und Optimieren unserer Backend-Systeme und Dienste.

Aufgaben:

1. Entwerfen und Implementieren von skalierbaren und wartbaren Backend-Diensten mit Typescript und Express.js.

2. Enge Zusammenarbeit mit dem Frontend-Team, Designern und anderen Stakeholdern, um eine reibungslose Integration und die Umsetzung unserer Marketingvisionen zu gewährleisten.

3. Wartung und Optimierung bestehender Backend-Dienste, um höchste Leistung und Zuverlässigkeit zu gewährleisten.

4. Sauberen, effizienten und wiederverwendbaren Code schreiben.

5. Sicherstellen der Sicherheit und des Datenschutzes aller Backend-Dienste.

6. Kontinuierliche Information über Best Practices in der Backend-Entwicklung und Einbringung neuer und frischer Ideen.

Qualifikationen:

1. 2-4 Jahre Berufserfahrung in der Backend-Entwicklung.

2. Versiert in Typescript und Express.js.

3. Solides Verständnis von RESTful APIs, Datenbankarchitektur und Designprinzipien.

4. Vertrautheit mit modernen Backend-Build-Pipelines und -Tools.

5. Erfahrung mit Datenbanktechnologien (z.B. MongoDB, MySQL).

6. Starke analytische und problemlösende Fähigkeiten.

7. Gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift.

Wünschenswert:

1. Erfahrung in einer Marketing- oder Werbeagentur.

2. Kenntnisse anderer Backend-Technologien/Frameworks.

3. Vertrautheit mit Cloud-Plattformen wie AWS.

Vorteile:

    Chilliger Shisha-Raum zum Entspannen
    Team-Events wie Comedy-Shows, Escape Rooms und Go-Kart-Rennen
    Coole Reisen nach Istanbul, Kusadasi und deutschlandweit
    Zahlreiche Möglichkeiten zur beruflichen Weiterentwicklung
    In der Mittagspause eine Runde Tischtennis - für extra Spaß!

Art der Stelle: Vollzeit

Gehalt: 3.300,00€ - 4.300,00€ pro Monat

Arbeitszeiten:

    Montag bis Freitag

Arbeitsort: Vor Ort
skillList: typescript, express, rest, mongodb, mysql, aws

title: Webdeveloper
description:
Für meinen Mandanten, ein mittelständisches Unternehmen im Dienstleistungssektor mit Fokus auf moderne Verständigung und Kooperation, welches sich durch die Realisierung von kreativen Vorhaben und der Betriebsförderung von Systemen wie Microsoft auszeichnet und von den rund 45 Mitarbeitern in etwa 30 kreative Köpfe zu seinen Informatikern zählt, die den IT-Bereich unterstützen, suche ich eine/n Webdeveloper:

Webdeveloper (m/w/d)
Gehalt: je nach Berufserfahrung bis 55.000€
Standort: Berlin
Ref. 23477

Was von Ihnen erwartet wird:

    Sie entwickeln Softwarelösungen mit Hilfe von JavaScript/ TypeScript und gängigen Frameworks wie React.
    Sie sind sowohl konzeptionell als auch technisch unterstützend tätig.
    Sie erstellen technische Berichte sowie Codereviews und führen diese aus.

 

Was Sie mitbringen:

    Sie haben ein abgeschlossenes Studium der Informatik oder eine vergleichbare Ausbildung.
    Quereinsteiger sind auch gerne willkommen.
    Sie bringen min. 2 Jahre Berufserfahrung als Software-Entwickler mit JavaScript mit.
    Idealerweise kennen Sie sich mit SPFx aus.
    Sie haben verhandlungssichere Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse auf Niveau C1.

 

Persönlich sollten Sie gerne in einem Team mit ca. 7 Kollegen und vor Ort an abwechslungsreichen Projekten für digitale, kundenorientierte Lösungen arbeiten. Außerdem sollten Sie Ihre Ideen einbringen wollen, um das Team und das Unternehmen, sowie Lösungen für eine moderne, digitale Zukunft und Gegenwart voranzubringen. Sie sollten eine strukturierte, zielorientierte und selbstständige Arbeitsweise haben, sowie Leidenschaft zum Detail mit dem Ziel, qualitativ hochwertige Lösungen für den Kunden zu entwickeln. Wünschenswert sind eine hohe Motivation, sich in neue Konzepte einzuarbeiten, sehr gute Kommunikationsfähigkeit und Teamfähigkeit.

Was Ihnen dieses Unternehmen bietet:

Trifft Ihren Geschmack: verschiedene spannende und interessante Herausforderungen in einem agilen Team mit familienfreundlicher Firmen-Kultur und Herausforderungen bei motivierender Arbeitsatmosphäre, mit Eigenverantwortung, Work-Life Balance, Gesundheit und Sicherheit, Firmenevents für ein soziales Miteinander, Küche, Freiraum und Flexibilität, Innovation und Expertise, in einem kreativen Arbeitsumfeld.

Bezahlt gut: sicherer Arbeitsplatz bei 40 Stunden Arbeitszeit pro Woche für eine Vollzeit Stelle, Teilzeit ist auch möglich, betriebliche Altersvorsorge mit 20% bezuschusst sowie 28 Urlaubstage.

Ist unkompliziert: Flache Hierarchien, flexible Arbeits- und Gleitzeiten, Kernarbeitszeit von 10:00 -16:00 Uhr, um Privat- und Berufsleben zu vereinen, sowie hybride Home-Office Regelungen mit 3-4 Tagen pro Woche im Homeoffice und 1-2 Tagen im Office.

Hat Zukunft und fördert Ihre Karriere: Individuelle Möglichkeiten und herausragende berufliche Perspektiven durch Weiterbildungsprogramme, Seminare, interne Kurse und externe Konferenzen. Microsoft Zertifizierungen sind Teil des obligatorischen Weiterbildungsprogramms im Rahmen der Stelle.

Das erwartet Sie bei Ihrem zukünftigen Arbeitgeber:

Kommen Sie bequem an, denn in der Nähe befindet sich eine Bahnstation. Ihren täglichen Arbeitsalltag gestalten Sie mit Ihren sympathischen Kollegen bei einer lockeren Arbeitsatmosphäre.

Dieses Unternehmen bietet Ihnen die Möglichkeit sich weiterzubilden und selbständig zu arbeiten und es werden gute und moderne Arbeitsmittel und Büroräume geboten. Es gibt eine Mischung aus kleineren und größeren Büros mit höhenverstellbaren Tischen, Stehplätzen und der Möglichkeit zum mobilen Arbeiten. Das Unternehmen glänzt durch kurze Entscheidungswege durch das Management. Die Position ist dem Teamleiter unterstellt. Das Unternehmen ist ein nachhaltiges Unternehmen, dass sich auch vor individuellen Arbeitszeitregelungen nicht scheut. Reisetätigkeit ist maximal 1-mal pro Jahr nötig.

Das Jobangebot klingt interessant, entspricht jedoch nicht genau Ihren Vorstellungen? Melden Sie sich gerne bei mir. Ich habe täglich neue Stellen für Sie. Des Weiteren pflege ich einen engen Kontakt zu den Entscheidern und sage Ihnen, worauf es ankommt. Sie sagen mir, wie Ihr Traumjob aussehen soll und wir finden gemeinsam die passende Stelle für Sie.

Ich freue mich auf Ihre Bewerbung.

Ihre Ansprechpartnerin

Julia Ratajczak

j.ratajczak@karesources.com

✆ +49 (0)2371 35 33 722
skillList: react, typescript, spfx

title: Software Engineer
description:
Location: Hamburg, Berlin, Köln, Düsseldorf, Gütersloh, München oder Remote
Welcome to smartclip! We’re just your average group of techies, you know, trying to keep the internet open and defend the European TV industry from Silicon Valley’s giants. Join us!

Your role

We are looking for an ambitious and driven Senior Software Engineer Web (f/m/d) - React, TypeScript who enjoys working in a high pace and constantly evolving industry. You will play a key role in our UI team: The team is creating an in-house React UI framework and builds new applications on top of it.
Your position in our team

    Understand and translate functional requirements into efficient, maintainable and scalable source code
    Active planning and implementation of complex web-based applications
    Further development of test automation
    Writing source code and tests
    Reviewing and testing source code

Your profile

    At least 4 years Technology experiences in TypeScript
    Testing experiences with frameworks like Jest, Cypress, etc.
    Active use of Typescript on top of Javascript
    Built components and know that they can be put together to create UIs
    Nice to have: Storybook, Ant Design

Your benefits

    Our Approach:
    We are driven by exciting projects that enable freedom for personal design and development opportunities. We pride ourselves on leveraging the latest technologies to stay ahead, including Node.js, C++, Java, Scala, Python, SQL, TypeScript, JavaScript, React, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Google Cloud, and many more.
    Tools & Equipment:
    We provide you with State-of-the-art equipment. Whether you prefer Mac, Linux, or any specific tool, you’ll have access to top-of-the-line equipment and state-of-the-art tools and programs.
    Flexible Work Environment:
    From embracing remote work opportunities to offering an “honour system-based” approach to working hours to “Smart Fridays” — our latest four-day workweek option — we understand the value of flexibility.
    Continuous Development:
    Investing in your growth is a priority for us. We offer diverse training opportunities through Udacity, Coursera, hackathons, conferences, and personal and professional coaching & training
    What else we offer you:
    We take care of our employees. That’s why we offer attractive company benefits, such as contributions towards the Deutschland-Ticket and JobRad, discounted fitness packages with Urban Sports Club, a free RTL+ premium subscription, corporate benefits discounts, engaging company events, and much more.

Come be a part of our highly motivated team, united by a shared passion for digital processes!

Sounds exciting?

Then we should get to know each other! Please upload your CV. 📬

smartclip is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, nationality, age, gender, gender identity, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other diverse characteristics. // $rank=4.9
skillList: react, typescript, jest, cypress, storybook, antdesign, java, scala, cplusplus, python, docker, kubernetes, aws, googlecloud

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR
We’re looking for an experienced Fullstack Engineer to join our Engineering team to help build the future of benefits. We launched our platform in 2018, built with the latest tech-stack: an architecture built on kubernetes and serverless, utilizing the TypeScript stack with Node.js in the Backend, and React and React Native in our frontends. LOFINO takes pride in its world-class engineering culture and as Fullstack Engineer of one of our teams, you will play a key role in sustaining and driving our mission.
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING
You will join a mission team, which is a cross-functional Engineering team whose mission is to extend our services, decrease complexity of use our services and executing on our User-Facing Product Strategy or unifying architecture and creating data streams. You will mainly be responsible for contributing to the technology, be responsible for engineering new functionality and driving the right technology choices. You will work with the Experience or Platform team, consisting of multiple engineers, an Engineering Manager, a Product Manager and an UI/UX designer, to ensure we have scalable, functional and tested software, which solves problems of our users and customers. You will work solution-oriented and will implement end-to-end with the support of the team.

LOFINO believes in a strong reviewing culture and following the clean-code principles. We are dedicated to DevOps, value the exchange on software topics, always provide a helping hand and have a “you build it, you run it” mindset. You will create an environment in which LOFINO and its customers can use great software solving their needs, supporting this world-class engineering culture.

    You will be responsible for implementing tested new functionalities in the frontend and backend.
    You will design and develop changes to the current software and work with the team to get to the best solutions.
    You will be bringing actively solutions to problems at hand, utilizing your experiences and problem-solving abilities.
    Using your technical background, you will be maintaining the software, keeping it up-to-date and solving for issues, while extending our infrastructure.
    You will work in cross-functional team, working with agile methods.
    You will work together with the architect function to bring new microservices to life.

WHAT SETS YOU UP FOR SUCCESS

    You have a strong technical background in application development, preferably in a large-scale cloud-based setting with modern software development practices such as CI/CD.
    You have 4+ years of experience of web development, primarily utilizing Javascript/ Typescript in the frontend and backend.
    You have good knowledge of Git and Docker.
    A plus is having mobile experience utilizing React Native or serverless experience, utilizing AWS Lambda while orchestrating domain-driven functionality.
    You can demonstrate having worked in an environment which has strong engineering practices and principles such as DevOps, DRY and pair programming and demonstrate how you have furthered the culture.
    You have solid experience working in a modern agile environment, ideally the Scrum-Framework.
    And last but certainly not least – someone with a sizeable appetite for learning and self-development, who prides themselves on being a valued member of the team!

WHAT MAKES WORKING AT LOFINO UNIQUE
Fair remuneration
Attractive compensation with 30 vacation days annually and the opportunity to take certified educational leave throughout Germany.

Flexible working hours and models
You decide whether you work part-time or full-time. Your working hours should be optimally compatible with your phase of life.

Hybrid and remote work
We support your personal freedom. Presence is not always required, but we are happy to meet you in one of our offices throughout Germany. Additionally, you have the possibility to work remotely within the EU for up to 6 weeks.

Equipment state-of-the-art
Employees will be provided with the necessary equipment.

Benefits
We support you with benefit budgets for mobility, lunch, internet and phone costs, as well as an individual training budget and access to discounted travel offers.

Appreciation
A collegial interaction and cooperation at eye level is a matter of course for us. LOFINO is characterized by flat hierarchies and short decision-making processes.
CAN YOU IMAGINE BEING INSPIRED BY LOFINO
Please apply even if you do not meet all the points. You can learn a lot while working with us.
We would work with you to find a start date and working hours model that suits you and us.

We welcome every application - regardless of ethnic, social and national origin, gender, religion, age, disability, sexual orientation, marital status and political views.
Auf diese Stelle bewerben
About us
LOFINO is a young and sustainable HR tech startup that now has over 50 employees. We enjoy working remotely and value the personal exchange at our main offices in Berlin and Munich equally.
LOFINO is the leading all-in-one solution for all challenges related to benefit and mobility offers and their payroll accounting. Thanks to our innovative SaaS product and our tax expertise, we manage HR and payroll processes simply, digitally and in compliance with tax regulations. Always with the aim of minimizing the effort for our corporate customers and creating a needs-based offering for their employees.

LOFINO was founded in 2018 and has been majority-owned by the JobRad Group since June 2022. JobRad is the market and quality leader in the booming company bike leasing sector.
Together, we have set ourselves the goal of making companies and their employees happy through sustainable benefits and mobility offers.
skillList: react, typescript, node, reactnative, git, docker, kubernetes, aws, lambda, ux, cicd

title: Full Stack Webentwickler
description:
Wohnsitz in Deutschland Homeoffice deutschlandweit
100% Homeoffice / Remote oder  in Hamburg und Essen
keine Gehaltsangabe

Du lernst neben coolen Leuten vor allem die wachsenden Strukturen eines Start-ups im Gesundheitswesen kennen und kannst diese von Anfang an mitgestalten. Bist du am Start?
Das wartet auf dich:

    Aufbau einer modernen Softwarelösung im Web und als App
    360° Rundumblick bei der Planung, Entwicklung und Umsetzung
    Teil des Entwickler- und Produktteams

Das bist du:

    Hands-on-Mentalität und Erfahrung in agilen Teams
    Leidenschaft bei der Einarbeitung in neue Technologien und neue Themen
    Einige Jahre Erfahrung in der Web Entwicklung, vorzugsweise mit PHP/Symfony und Angular
    Containern ist für dich nicht vorrangig Lebensmittelbeschaffung
    Geborener Tekkie, aber du magst auch Menschen

Das bekommst du:

    Flexibilität: remote-first, zentrale Headquarter in Essen und Hamburg sowie freie Wahl deiner Hardware
    Vitalität: umfangreiches Sportprogramm, Dienstradleasing sowie frisches Obst und Getränke
    Weiterbildung: jährliches Entwicklungsbudget in Höhe von 1.000 Euro
    Erholung: 30 Tage verdienter Urlaub im Jahr
    Vielseitigkeit: ganzheitliche Aufgaben, viel Eigenverantwortung, flache Hierarchien und kreative Mitgestaltungsmöglichkeiten

Wenn wir dein Interesse geweckt haben und du zukünftig morgens mit guter Laune in den Tag starten willst, freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbung. Entweder direkt über unser Onlineportal oder per Mail an bewerbungen@thevea.de.

Wir freuen uns darauf, dich kennenzulernen!

Unabhängig von den Texten in unseren Stellenanzeigen betonen wir, dass bei opta data alle Menschen gleichermaßen willkommen sind.
thevea GmbH
thevea GmbH6 offene Stellen
Du bist auf der Suche nach einem neuen Job in einem Start-up? Gleichzeitig willst du eine langfristige und sichere Perspektive? Dann haben wir den idealen Job für dich: Die thevea GmbH bietet dir als Corporate Startup (der opta data Gruppe) die optimale Grundlage für kreative und ganzheitliche Arbeit.

Das ist die Mission: In Deutschland gibt es mehr als 70.000 Heilmittelerbringern wie z. B. Physio- und Ergotherapeuten, Logopäden und Podologen, die im Papierkram untergehen. Mit unserer Software gestalten wir ihre Arbeit so einfach wie
Deine Kontaktperson ist
Jasmin Habegger
HR-Partnerin

title: FullStack Entwickler
description:
Published
08.03.2021
Location
Berlin, Germany
Job Type
Full-time  
Job Reference
18571
Estimated Salary
60.000 € - 80.000 €
Responsible for
Anforderungsanalyse, Design und Entwicklung von Lösungen
Skills
C#, .NET Core, Java, Go und/oder Node.js - Type/JavaScript, SCSS/LESS sowie HTML5 - SQL und/oder NoSQL - Angular, React oder Vue.js - Docker und Kubernetes - REST, SOAP, Microservices und API Gateways - Git, Unit Tests und Automatisierungstools
Description

Für einen Microsoft Gold Partner der Beratungsdienstleistungen in den Bereichen Business Analyse, Software-Architektur und Entwicklung für mittelständische und große Unternehmen anbietet, suche ich eine/n FullStack Entwickler/in:

                                                               

FullStack Entwickler (m/w/d)

In unbefristeter Festanstellung

Gehalt: 60.000 € - 80.000 € brutto im Jahr

Standort: Frankfurt am Main oder Berlin

Reisebereitschaft: 40 % - 60 %

Ref. 18571

Das Unternehmen:

Seit über 10 Jahren bietet das Unternehmen Beratungsdienstleistungen an für Ihre Kunden mit Projekten im On Premise, Cloud und Hybrid Technology Bereich.

Dabei dreht sich alles um die Integration von Anwendungen, Daten, Prozessen, Systemen und Menschen.

Durch den gezielten Kompetenzaufbau deckt das Unternehmen den gesamten IT-Projekt – und Beratungsbereich ab. Das Unternehmen zeichnet sich aus durch Professionalität und klare Kommunikation bei seinem Full-Service-Angebot.

Darüber hinaus ist das Unternehmen sehr professionell und strukturiert und pflegt Kommunikation auf Augenhöhe in einem harmonischen Team bietet das Unternehmen eine Mischung aus Fun und Professionalität.

 

Ihr Aufgabengebiet:

    Sie machen die Anforderungsanalyse und erstellen eine Lösung.
    Sie entwerfen das Design und setzten die fachlichen Anforderungen um.
    Sie setzen neueste Microsoft Technologien, Frameworks und Microservices Architekturen ein und arbeiten an agilen Cloud und Web Projekten.
    Mitwirkung und Zusammenarbeit mit dem agilen Entwicklungsteam in einer verantwortungsvollen Position bei internen Projekten sowie Kundenprojekte.
    Persönliche Weiterbildung in der Softwareentwicklung, der Beratung sowie Weiterentwicklung zur nächsten Karrierestufe.
    Die Aufteilung der Beschäftigung ist im Normalfall 80%-90% Entwicklung und 20%-10% Beratung. Dies kann je nach Bedarf gestaltet werden.

 

Ihr Profil:

    Ein abgeschlossenes Studium oder eine Ausbildung der Informatik.
    Mindestens 3 Jahre Berufserfahrung in der Softwareentwicklung.
    (Sehr) gute Kenntnisse als Software Entwickler im Bereich C#, .NET Core, Java, Go und/oder Node.js.
    (Sehr) gute Kenntnisse in Type/JavaScript, SCSS/LESS sowie HTML5.
    (Sehr) gute Kenntnisse im Umgang mit Datenbanken mit SQL und/oder NoSQL.
    Erfahrungen mit Angular, React oder Vue.js sowie mit Docker und Kubernetes.
    Erfahrungen mit REST, SOAP, Microservices und API Gateways.
    Erfahrung mit Git, Unit Tests und Automatisierungstools.
    Die Fähigkeit plattformunabhängig zu Coden.
    von Vorteil sind Erfahrungen mit DevOps (u.a. CI/CD).
    Erfahrungen und Bereitschaft zur Beratung von Kunden.
    Schnelle Auffassungsgabe für komplexe Sachverhalte.
    Verständliche und offene Kommunikation in deutscher Sprache. Englisch ist wünschenswert.
    Eigenverantwortliches Denken und Handeln.

 

Aktuell in Corona Zeiten machen die Mitarbeiter zu 100% Homeoffice. Nach Corona wird ein 2+3- oder 3+2-Modell angewendet, d.h. 2 oder 3 Tag im Homeoffice und den Rest im Office oder im Office des Kunden.

Das Modell besagt, dass für jeden Mitarbeiter, der für sich dieses Modell in Anspruch nimmt, 3-4 Monate nach einem Projekt innerhalb der Fokusregion gesucht wird. Und erst danach muss der Mitarbeiter temporär ein Projekt außerhalb der Fokusregion annehmen. Darnach wir so schnell wie möglich ein Projekt zurück in die Fokusregion gesucht. Die Fokusregion ist so definiert, dass wenn Sie z.B den Standort Frankfurt am Main zugeordnet sind, dann ist all das innerhalb der Fokusregion, was sie morgens hin und abends zurück mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln oder dem Auto erreichen können.

Es werden sehr gute Softwareentwickler gesucht, die auch bereit sind, mit den Kunden zu kommunizieren und zu präsentieren.

Das Unternehmen bietet ihnen:

    Herausfordernde Aufgaben in einem modernen, wachstumsreichen Arbeitsumfeld.
    Flexible Arbeitszeiten.
    Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten MS Zertifikate.
    Individuelles internes Peer-to-Peer Coaching je nach Level.
    Lernen auf Enterprise-Niveau zu agieren.
    Teilnahme an spannenden Events.
    1-mal im Monat ein Meeting, um das Know-How von besonderen Technologien zu verbessern.
    1-mal im Jahr Kommunikationstraining.
    Ausstattung (Handy mit Flatrate und Notebook nach eigener Wahl).
    Verpflegung mit gratis Getränke und einmal im Monat ein gemeinsames Frühstück und Mittagessen. Darüber hinaus gibt es in der Umgebung reichliche Angebote zur alltäglichen Verpflegung.
    Betriebliche Altersvorsorge.
    Mitarbeiter-Beteiligung.
    Home Office je nach Projektlage (in der Coronazeit 100%).
    Duz Kultur.
    Sommer- und Weihnachtsfest + Familie.
    Die Büros liegen in einer zentralen Lage.
    Sehr gut mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln und Auto (Autobahn) erreichbar.
    Viele weitere Benefits wie jedes Quartal ein technisches Gadget (z.B. Drohne, Hoverboard, XBox, Apple Watch), dass jeder ausleihen und ausprobieren kann. Sämtliche Fachliteratur oder eine Pluralsight-Subscription wird auf Wunsch bestellt und bereitgestellt. Und vieles mehr...

Dieses Stellenangebot klingt interessant, entspricht aber nicht genau Ihren Vorstellungen?

Setzen Sie sich mit uns in Verbindung: Wir haben ständig unterschiedliche Vakanzen anzubieten, sowohl beim Endkunden mit geringer Reisetätigkeit als auch beim Partner. Wir arbeiten sehr eng mit verschiedenen Unternehmen in der Industrie zusammen und pflegen einen engen Kontakt zu den Entscheidern bei unseren Kunden. Bestimmt ist auch etwas für Sie dabei!

 

Ihre Ansprechpartnerin

Jessica Böhm

j.boehm@karesources.com

✆ +49 (0)2371 35 33 722
skillList: csharp, dotnetcore, java, go, node, typescript, sass, less, sql, nosql, angular, react, vue, docker, kubernetes, rest, soap, microservices, git, testing, cicd

title: Software Engineer Fullstack
description:
Why Scout24? 
Scout24 is home of ImmoScout24, Germany’s #1 for real estate. With ImmoScout24 we have been revolutionizing the real estate market in Germany and Austria for more than 25 years. Our goal is to build a digital ecosystem that brings homeowners, seekers, and agents together. Finding the right home and property is one of the most important decisions in life. So is your career! #WorkingatScout24 means being part of a diverse and inclusive team of 1,060 employees und 58 nationalities. We embrace difference and celebrate individuality. By encouraging open mindedness and authenticity we enable a true learning culture and prepare the ground for personal development.  Mistakes are a chance to grow and to innovate. Together we act proactively, strive for improvement, and take responsibility. We talk about success and challenge while treating each other with respect because we are #oneteam. 

If this sounds interesting to you, we would love to see you joining us!  Even if you may not tick all the boxes of the job requirements, we are happy to hear about the value you can add to the team.  Grow with us!. Welcome home!  

Aside from our people and company culture we are offering awesome benefits that make Scout24 a great place to work!  

    Compensation: A competitive salary package and a bonus on top.  
    Flexibility: Decide for yourself where you work most effectively. We offer you a hybrid working model, autonomous working time management and 30 days of vacation annually.  
    Work from abroad: Our remote working policy includes the possibility to work from abroad for a few weeks per year.(if it gets along with the business and team needs)
    Relocation: Our relocation agency supports you with your visa process and an attractive relocation package.  
    Use our products: As an employee you can take advantage of our plus membership for tenants on ImmoScout24 to find a new place to live.  
    Development: Dedicated learning time per month, online courses on our ScoutAcademy, regular book challenges, structured feedback, “Lunch & Learn”-Events and individual career paths to push your career to the next level.    
    Have kids? We'll support you with a professional family service, which helps you to find a childcare center or offers emergency childcare.    
    Furry feel good manager: Bring your dog to work (upon approval, as we prioritize the well-being of our employees and ensure that our dog policy is considerate of allergic individuals and prevents overcrowding on each office floor)
    Mobility: We subsidize public transport or Job Bikes. 
    Commitment to sustainability and Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI): We have clear environmental and climate protection goals and are involved in social activities and charitable organizations throughout the year. We live the diversity. Our theme weeks on diversity, mental well-being, and other social issues give us time and space to develop ourselves on DEI and sustainability.
    Pension scheme: We offer a company pension scheme and support your own contribution with an attractive subsidy.
    Most innovative office: Our office is barrier-free and in the heart of Berlin right at the central station. It was awarded for the most innovative office concept. We have an own gym with regular courses, napping room, rooftop terrace, organic coffee, cafeteria, 100% green electricity and a massage therapist that comes in once a week.
    Health: Life Situation Coaching, regular health check ups.
    We are a tech company: We work with the latest technical tools and hardware.  

How your role will look like:

    Play a pivotal role in designing and implementing innovative user-focused solutions across the Scout24 digital real estate ecosystem.
    Work within diverse, cross-functional teams, design, develop, and deploy large-scale, performant software solutions on AWS based on our microservices architecture.
    Utilize Java or Kotlin for Spring-based applications and TypeScript for serverless to implement efficient backend logic.
    Collaborate with UX specialists to implement features into the user-facing applications, following modern best practices in frontend using React.
    Demonstrate ownership of the development cycle, adhering to the "You build it you run it" approach.
    Act as a role model for high-quality engineering principles, promoting clean code, pair programming, continuous delivery, and test-driven development, mentor junior team members in engineering best practices.
    Continuously evaluate and implement improvements to technology and processes by staying abreast of current trends in software design and architecture.

What you need to succeed:

    Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field. 
    Minimum 3-4 years of professional experience in full stack software development. 
    Proficiency in Java or Kotlin, React, and TypeScript with hands-on experience applying modern best practices in our technology stack.  
    Knowledge and experience in Spring Security and Authorisation and Authentication flows such as Oauth2 and OpenID standards. 
    Prior experience in creating and managing AWS resources and familiarity with Infrastructure as code concept. 
    Business focus, coupled with the ability to critically question and challenge product managers and UX designers. 
    A deep passion for technology and a proven record of successfully delivering high-quality products.  
    Extensive experience in designing, building, testing, debugging, and optimizing code for large-scale distributed systems. 
    Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a dynamic, cross-functional team. 
    Proven leadership skills with the ability to mentor and guide junior team members. 
    Strong commitment to continuous learning, curiosity, and knowledge sharing within the team 

 

We aim to further enhance the diversity of our company and support the professional development of people with disabilities. We have a disability representative who will assist you throughout the application process. If you require this support, please let us know in advance.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
What we do

We build software that helps companies along the food system get to Net Zero.

~31% of global GHG emissions originate from food-related activities. For the first time in history, climate performance has become an overall business performance indicator. Enterprises are mandated by regulatory bodies to disclose their climate performance, which leads to increasing pressure from investors, competitors, retailers, and consumers to prevent and reduce their CO2e emissions. Over the next 10 years, companies have set ambitious reduction targets that need to be met. Enterprise software and new business processes can help.

We raised >€10m in funding in the first 2 years of our existence, we launched our enterprise product, signed and onboarded some of the largest F&B players in Europe, and put together what we believe is the best-suited early stage tech team in Europe.

Will you be the next to join us?

What you will work on

Your mission

Build and scale our software products with a sense of full ownership.

In the first 6 months, your focus will be on

    Coding (this is a very hands-on role) our web application – frontend, backend and infrastructure

    Adjusting and expanding our tech stack where necessary

    Setting up and improving our infrastructure set-up – with a focus on database structure, data pipelines and analytics, which is a big part of the value we offer to our customers

    Setting the foundations for our engineering practices in line with our broader operating model to attract and retain the best engineering talent in Europe

Tech Stack

    Our tech stack, much like our business and product, is still in its early stage. Joining at this point means you will still play a key role in defining what tools and technologies we will use to build up Root Global for years to come!

    Our product consists of multiple web applications our customers use, based on a backend consisting of user input data (procurement, product composition, etc.) calculation models, and plug-ins to various emission factor/LCA databases

    Frontend: React and Next.js

    Backend: Node.js w/Typescript, PostgreSQL

    Infra: AWS

What you bring along

Based on what you know on the role you are the best evaluator to decide if you believe this is a role you will be able to thrive in.

These are some things that would help:

    You have built full-stack web applications before – that people are actually using

    You have worked in an early stage VC-backed startup (pre-seed/seed), preferably with a B2B business model

    You feel comfortable with broad product requirements and enjoy participating in the product conceptualisation phase

    You feel comfortable guiding teams through technical troubleshooting and delivering feedback on topics beyond technical performance.

You don’t feel like you fulfill all the criteria? We get it: confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But guess what?! There is no such thing as a ‘perfect’ candidate. The only thing you need to ensure along the recruiting process and beyond is that the problem that we are solving with Root is one you cannot wait to get out of bed for on Monday morning!
skillList: react, nextjs, node, typescript, postgres, aws

title: Senior Front-End Developer
description:
Summary

To provide our customers with experiences which are both powerful with as much features as necessary but also serves the future of our planet by creating as little carbon emissions as possible, we strive for developing the most efficient and lean solutions throughout our software development process. This is where the goals between high-end software development and sustainability meet in its core: less is more and efficiency is key.
Your responsibilities

You will join our tech team as a Senior Frontend Developer and work on all major front-end systems of our product lines and content management ecosystem. You will work closely with product-, design- and tech people in a very lean and agile manner.
Qualification and skills

    Expert in vanilla JavaScript and strong on writing performant code and clean architectures
    Extensive experience in frameworks like React.js, semantic HTML5, CSS3 (and a CSS preprocessor of your choice) and tooling (Rollup.js, Webpack, npm scripts, etc.)
    In-Depth, thorough, and up-to-date knowledge of the Web- and Browser-Ecosystem
    Knowledge in or eager to learn new frameworks such as Astro
    Focused on ensuring the highest level of quality in all deliverables
    Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, agile team with a very high attention to detail
    Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills
    Very good language skills in English
    Bonus: Experience with video infrastructure and delivery (adaptive streaming, encoding, etc.)
    Bonus: Knowledge of advertisement stacks and standards such as VAST
    Bonus: Experience in development of backend systems written in Node.js
    Bonus: Experience with Firebase or other real-time databases
    Bonus: Experience developing real-time systems

Benefits

    Become part of a highly motivated and professional interdisciplinary team
    Experience and shape a communicative, creative, and stimulating working environment with a high degree of freedom
    Work on highly challenging web-frontend applications to amaze millions of people
    Be part of a team that cares for the future of our planet by applying world-class engineering
skillList: react, rollup, webpack, astro, node, firebase

title: Frontend Entwickler
description:
Vollzeit - Teilzeit - Hybrid / Nürnberg / Dortmund
Frontend Entwickler (m/w/x)

Bei infoteam entwickeln mehr als 300 Mitarbeitende individuelle Softwarelösungen für die unterschiedlichsten Märkte - unter anderem auch im Bereich Public Service. Unsere modernen Softwarelösungen ebnen den Weg für transparente und bürgernahe IT-Services und fördern damit das Vertrauen der Bevölkerung in unsere öffentlichen Auftraggeber. Mit agiler Teamarbeit und neuesten Softwaretechnologien begeistern wir unsere Kunden. Kreative Lösungsentwicklung und dynamisches Arbeiten in verschiedensten Projektbereichen sind hier nur ein kleiner Teil dieser spannenden Herausforderung. Du fühlst dich angesprochen? Dann möchten wir dich unbedingt kennenlernen. Weitere Informationen darüber, was Public Service bei uns bedeutet, findest du hier.
Das erwartet dich bei uns

In agiler Teamarbeit und unter Verwendung der neuesten Technologien entwickelst du Software, welche die digitale Zukunft der öffentlichen Verwaltung nachhaltig voranbringt.
Dabei hilfst du uns den Staat menschlicher zu machen in dem du z.B. junge Menschen, durch eine koordinierte Unterstützung verschiedener Beratungsstellen, den optimalen Weg in die Eigenständigkeit finden lässt oder du die Bereitstellung von Online-Zugängen für Bürgerdienste realisierst.

    Planung und Entwicklung von hochqualitative Softwarelösungen im Team
    Enge Vernetzung und stetige Zusammenarbeit auf Augenhöhe mit unseren Kunden
    Aktives Weiterdenken und -entwickeln von agilen Prozessen

Dabei kannst du unter anderem mit den folgenden Technologien arbeiten:

Responsive Design, Angular, React und weiteren Skriptsprachen
Das bringst Du mit

    Berufserfahrung in den verschiedensten Gebieten der Webentwicklung
    Interesse an der Arbeit in einem Scrum-Team und Spaß an agiler Teamarbeit
    Motivation, dich weiterzuentwickeln und deinen Tech-Stack stetig auf dem Laufenden zu halten
    Das Interesse und die Weitsicht, die digitale Zukunft mitzugestalten

Bei infoteam sind wir überzeugt: Nur motivierte, begeisterte und zufriedene Mitarbeitende können die Art von herausragender Software entwickeln, die wir und unsere Kunden so sehr schätzen. Für uns ist die Vereinbarkeit von Privatleben, Familie und Beruf deshalb sehr wichtig und flexible Arbeitszeiten und die Möglichkeit auf Homeoffice ist für uns selbstverständlich. Wir lachen gerne während der Arbeit und schätzen kurze Wege mit flachen Hierarchien. Gegenseitige Unterstützung, Vertrauen und Begeisterung für die Arbeit stehen im Mittelpunkt unserer Unternehmenskultur.
Unsere Benefits

    Individuelle Fort- und Weiterbildung
    Flexible Arbeitszeiten, Teilzeit grundsätzlich möglich und digitale Zeiterfassung
    Betriebliche Krankenzusatzversicherung
    Homeoffice
    30 Tage Urlaub
    Kita-Zuschuss
    Firmenfahrrad
    Team-Events, Sommerfest, Weihnachtsfeier etc.
    Vielseitige, wechselnde Sportangebote und Gesundheitsvorsorge
    VGN-Firmenabo
    Betriebliche Altersvorsorge
    Kantine
    Getränke, Obst und Gemüse kostenfrei
    Kicker-/Flipperraum
    Mitarbeiterrabatte
    Firmenparkplatz
